headline: Advisor with $130 Million Joins Ameriprise from LPL to Meet Clients’ Unique Needs and Create Practice Efficiencies
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, February 11, 2025--Financial advisor Jeff Impey, CFP ®, recently joined the branch channel of Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) from LPL Financial with $130 million in assets in Roseville, California. Impey joined Ameriprise for the opportunity to partner with a client-focused firm that offers extensive support and resources.

headline: Ameriprise price target raised to $582 from $560 at Argus
summary: Argus raised the firm’s price target on Ameriprise (AMP) to $582 from $560 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. Ameriprise has generated solid revenue in recent quarters, driven by net inflows, the addition of experienced advisers, and growth at the Ameriprise Bank, partly offset by equity and fixed income volatility, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
